name: Recursion Tale
description:
Recursion Tale, a short and queue-te adventure!

This was made during a 24-hour hackathon. We only had time to make two levels, so nothing happens once you finish the second one. Also, for some reason the text for the instructions/story won't show on screen after building the game in Unity. So included below is the text that should show up in each level.

Thanks for playing!

-----------------

Level 1:

Welcome!
This little one is named Widget.
Widget is trying to prepare to go into other programs!
But Widget needs your help to test all their functions!
Let's start with walking. Click the Walk() button to add walking to the queue!
The queue performs actions in the order they were added!
Once you have actions in the queue, you can click the start button!

Level 2:

Now let's try jumping!
Press the Jump() button to add a jump to the queue!
Then press start like you did for walking!
